entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
